p: Pure lavender ( L. angustifolia) essential oil (LEO) was kindly supplied by Pranarom International (Belgium). According to the GC-MS analyses performed by Pranarom, lavender essential oil (LEO) showed the following composition: linalyl acetate (35.96%), linalool (35.29%), β-caryophyllene (3.37%), trans-β-ocimene (2.88%), cis-β-ocimene (2.67%), lavandulyl acetate (2.29%), and terpinen-4-ol (1.94%).
